events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information has not updated for several days.
The message content indicates a delivery delay issue with no references to defects or refunds.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team for further investigation.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your delayed order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can look into the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking says 'In Transit' but has not updated for 5 days now.
Thank you for the info. I contacted the shipping carrier and learned there was a delay due to weather. Your package should arrive within 3 more days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed but appreciate you checking. I will wait a bit longer for the delivery.
We are glad we could clarify the delay. Please reach out if you need further assistance once the package arrives.
We wanted to check if you have received your order now and if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, my order arrived yesterday in perfect condition. Thank you for your help and follow-up!
We’re happy your order arrived safely. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
